# The Pets Garden - Premium Pet Care Website

## Project Overview
Next.js website for "The Pets Garden" - a premium pet care service with modern, luxury-inspired design.

## Design Guidelines
- Modern, premium aesthetic inspired by boutique hospitality
- Color palette: warm white/ivory background, matte gold accents, soft beige
- Typography: elegant serif for headings, clean sans-serif for body
- Clean layout with generous white space
- Smooth transitions and subtle animations

## Code Standards
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Responsive design (mobile-first)
- Clean, reusable components
- SEO-friendly structure
- Modern React patterns with hooks

## Brand Identity
- Brand: The Pets Garden
- Logo: Gold Ganesh-inspired "T"
- Tone: Warm, trustworthy, premium, pet-friendly

## Key Features
- Hero section with CTAs
- Services showcase
- Featured pets gallery
- Why choose us section
- Contact form with WhatsApp integration
- Responsive navigation

This project prioritizes user experience, visual appeal, and professional presentation of pet care services.
